Padaju rekordi: Salcburg odredio cenu za norvešku senzaciju
06 Nov 2019, 14:13 by Darko
Erling Braut Haland upisao se u istoriju Lige šampiona, a izvesno je da će mnogi rekordi tek pasti pred norveškom senzacijom.
Golgeter Salcburga je u utorak bio strelac jedinog gola svog tima protiv Napolija i tako postao tek četvrti igrač u istoriji koji je postigao gol u svakom od četiri prva nastupa u elitnom takmičenju. Pre Halanda to su učinili samo Ze Karlos (Porto, 1992/93), Alesandro Del Pjero (Juventus, 1995) i Dijego Kosta (Atletiko Madrid, 2013/14).
Norvežanin je postao i prvi igrač koji je postigao čak sedam golova u prve četiri utakmice Lige šampiona.
U Salcburgu trljaju ruke jer im se smeši rekordan transfer. Naime, čelnici austrijskog kluba su odredili obeštećenje koje će morati da plate klubovi zainteresovani za Halanda, a njih je sve više. U pitanju je cifra od 100 miliona evra, a kao najozbiljniji kupci pominju se Mančester Junajted, Juventus i Real Madrid.
Salcburg je Halanda doveo u januaru iz Moldea za pet miliona evra, a Norvežanin je od početka ove sezone postigao 23 gola na 17 utakmica u svim takmičenjima.

Records are falling: Salzburg sets the price for a Norwegian sensation
06 Nov 2019, 13:13 by Darko
Erling Braut Haland has entered the history of the Champions League, and it is certain that many records will just fall before the Norwegian sensation.
The Salzburg goalkeeper was the only goal scorer for his team against Napoli on Tuesday, becoming the fourth player in history to score in each of his four first-team appearances in elite competition. Prior to Holland, only Ze Carlos (Porto, 1992/93), Alessandro Del Pero (Juventus, 1995) and Diego Costa (Atletico Madrid, 2013/14) did so.
The Norwegian also became the first player to score as many as seven goals in the first four Champions League games.
They are rubbing their hands in Salzburg because of their record-breaking transfer. Namely, the leaders of the Austrian club have determined the compensation that clubs interested in Haland will have to pay, and there are more and more of them. The figure is € 100 million, with Manchester United, Juventus and Real Madrid as the most serious buyers.
Salzburg brought Halanda in January from Molde for five million euros, and the Norwegian has scored 23 goals in 17 games in all competitions since the start of this season.
